Obs#

This module contains the class to manage observation in a GPS track Points are referenced in geodetic coordinates

class tracklib.core.Obs.Obs(position, timestamp=None)[source]#

Class to define an observation

__init__(position, timestamp=None)[source]#

Constructor of Obs class

Parameters

  • position (ENUCoords) – A point coordinate

  • timestamp (Optional[ObsTime]) – The time stamp of acquisition (Default timestamp is 1970/01/01 00:00:00)
